title: Midas [Widescreen]
creator_credit: AFTRS, Isabel Perez and Niki Bern
brief_description: The classic children’s story of King Midas is retold from the perspective of an adult narrator, with live action and special effects set against a fantastic picture book background. The narrator gets to the heart of the story, revealing the practicalities and dark undertones of being the man with the golden touch. Cast includes Jason Chatwin (King Midas) and Hanna Colles (the Princess).
